title: FS: T206 Cy Young Portrait SGC 1.5
author: YazFenway08

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Cy Young Portrait SGC 1.5
posts.post_content:
T206 Cy Young Portrait -- SGC 1.5

Submitted to SGC in July 2021, so relatively recently graded.  Thought it had a solid shot at a 2.

Presents really nicely in hand.  Lower right corner is the biggest issue.  A couple of light wrinkles on the front that do not appear to penetrate the back...neither impacts his visage.  Those are a little more visible on the picture with the flash glare...they really aren't very obtrusive

Asking $2450 shipped,  net PayPal.  

I will listen to reasonable offers and have a little wiggle room on this...but this stacks up nicely to recent auction comps...feel free to reach out via PM with questions.

thanks
Mike
Thanks guys.  I had a far ickier version a few years ago…a 2 that to me looked like it had been put in a blender. To me, no comparison…but SGC didn’t ask for my opinion 🙃
I'd honestly hold on to this card, unless you need to sell. It's a very nice example, and only going up.
with offer - 3 days ago.  Never saw a reply.
Deal per our earlier emails. Thanks Mike.

[quote name="OhioCardCollector" post=2202441]Deal per our earlier emails. Thanks Mike.[/QUOTE]


Nice grab Arnie…..beautiful card.

Thanks. Finally my 1st Cy. Have so much Cleveland stuff, it was time.
